text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Forget to share the actual facts?  https://t.co/NHLTHMytbK  just over 2% of the population have been tested & soon you will have 1.5 Million cases, (that you know about), & 100,000 families will have lost loved ones!  Not really boasting material -or is this your kind of winning? https://t.co/L4gwDLNFnb
